name: Idempotent removal - repeating the operation
description:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
  the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
descriptionHtml:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
statusMessage:
[HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]
statusTrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: [HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]

	at eu.delimata.bookstore.stepdefinitions.BooksSteps.systemInformsItemUnavailableOnSecondDelete(BooksSteps.java:257)

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1744916058, title=The Skull Beneath the Skin, description=Nemo accusantium repellat et dolores ut., pageCount=1110, excerpt=Ad temporibus ipsa dolorum laboriosam maiores rem. Quia incidunt laborum commodi ut possimus. Commodi id est., publishDate=2025-09-20T16:42:20.315265491Z]

steps.name: And I have removed that book from the bookstore
When I attempt to remove the same book again
Then the system informs me the book item is already unavailable and no further changes are made
